skills.name: Accounting
skills.description: Used to calculate financial matters, manage accounts, and handle business-related numerical tasks.
skills.description_cn: 用于计算财务事项、管理账目和处理与业务相关的数字任务。

skills.name: Animal Handling
skills.description: Used to handle, train, and understand animals.
skills.description_cn: 用于处理、训练和理解动物。

skills.name: Anthropology
skills.description: Used to understand human cultures, societies, and historical developments.
skills.description_cn: 用于理解人类文化、社会和历史发展。

skills.name: Appraise
skills.description: Used to determine the value of objects, antiques, and valuables.
skills.description_cn: 用于确定物品、古董和贵重物品的价值。

skills.name: Archaeology
skills.description: Used to conduct excavations, analyze artifacts, and understand ancient civilizations.
skills.description_cn: 用于进行挖掘、分析文物和理解古代文明。

skills.name: Art and Craft
skills.description: Used to create artistic works or craft items. This skill can have various specializations such as Painting, Sculpture, etc.
skills.description_cn: 用于创作艺术作品或手工制品。这项技能可以有各种专业化，如绘画、雕塑等。

skills.name: Artillery
skills.description: Used to operate and manage heavy artillery weapons.
skills.description_cn: 用于操作和管理重型火炮武器。

skills.name: Charm
skills.description: Used to influence or persuade others through charisma and likability.
skills.description_cn: 通过个人魅力和讨人喜欢的特质来影响或说服他人。

skills.name: Climb
skills.description: Used to scale walls, trees, and other vertical obstacles.
skills.description_cn: 用于攀爬墙壁、树木和其他垂直障碍物。

skills.name: Computer Use
skills.description: Used to operate computers, perform data analysis, and handle modern technological tasks.
skills.description_cn: 用于操作计算机、执行数据分析和处理现代技术任务。

skills.name: Credit Rating
skills.description: Represents a character's financial standing and reputation in society.
skills.description_cn: 代表角色在社会中的财务状况和声誉。

skills.name: Cthulhu Mythos
skills.description: Knowledge of the forbidden lore, ancient deities, and cosmic horrors related to the Mythos.
skills.description_cn: 关于禁忌知识、古老神祇和与神话相关的宇宙恐怖的了解。

skills.name: Demolitions
skills.description: Used to handle, set up, and disarm explosive devices.
skills.description_cn: 用于处理、设置和拆除爆炸装置。

skills.name: Disguise
skills.description: Used to alter appearance or impersonate someone else.
skills.description_cn: 用于改变外貌或冒充他人。

skills.name: Diving
skills.description: Used to perform underwater activities, including swimming and underwater exploration.
skills.description_cn: 用于进行水下活动，包括游泳和水下探索。

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Used to evade physical attacks or hazards.
skills.description_cn: 用于躲避物理攻击或危险。

skills.name: Drive Auto
skills.description: Used to operate and control motor vehicles.
skills.description_cn: 用于操作和控制机动车辆。

skills.name: Electrical Repair
skills.description: Used to fix and maintain electrical systems and devices.
skills.description_cn: 用于修理和维护电气系统和设备。

skills.name: Electronics
skills.description: Used to understand and work with electronic equipment and systems.
skills.description_cn: 用于理解和操作电子设备和系统。

skills.name: Fast Talk
skills.description: Used to persuade or deceive others through quick and smooth talking.
skills.description_cn: 通过快速流畅的言辞来说服或欺骗他人。

skills.name: Fighting
skills.description: Used in hand-to-hand combat situations. This skill can have various specializations such as Boxing, Wrestling, etc.
skills.description_cn: 用于近身战斗情况。这项技能可以有各种专业化，如拳击、摔跤等。

skills.name: Firearms
skills.description: Used to operate and handle firearms. This skill can have various specializations such as Pistols, Rifles, etc.
skills.description_cn: 用于操作和使用火器。这项技能可以有各种专业化，如手枪、步枪等。

skills.name: First Aid
skills.description: Used to provide basic medical assistance and stabilize injured individuals.
skills.description_cn: 用于提供基本医疗援助和稳定受伤人员。

skills.name: History
skills.description: Used to recall historical events, figures, and contexts.
skills.description_cn: 用于回忆历史事件、人物和背景。

skills.name: Hypnosis
skills.description: Used to influence or control others through hypnotic techniques.
skills.description_cn: 通过催眠技术来影响或控制他人。

skills.name: Intimidate
skills.description: Used to influence others through fear or threats.
skills.description_cn: 通过恐惧或威胁来影响他人。

skills.name: Jump
skills.description: Used to leap over obstacles or cover distances vertically.
skills.description_cn: 用于跳过障碍物或垂直覆盖距离。

skills.name: Language (Own)
skills.description: Represents proficiency in the character's native language.
skills.description_cn: 代表角色母语的熟练程度。

skills.name: Law
skills.description: Used to understand and apply legal principles, statutes, and procedures.
skills.description_cn: 用于理解和应用法律原则、法规和程序。

skills.name: Library Use
skills.description: Used to conduct research, find information, and navigate library resources.
skills.description_cn: 用于进行研究、查找信息和导航图书馆资源。

skills.name: Listen
skills.description: Used to hear and discern sounds, conversations, or environmental noises.
skills.description_cn: 用于听取和辨别声音、对话或环境噪音。

skills.name: Locksmith
skills.description: Used to pick locks, disable security devices, and create keys.
skills.description_cn: 用于开锁、禁用安全设备和制作钥匙。

skills.name: Lore
skills.description: Represents specialized knowledge in various academic or professional fields. Specializations can include areas like Medicine, Engineering, etc.
skills.description_cn: 代表各种学术或专业领域的专门知识。专业化可以包括医学、工程等领域。

skills.name: Mechanical Repair
skills.description: Used to fix and maintain machinery and mechanical systems.
skills.description_cn: 用于修理和维护机械和机械系统。

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: Used to diagnose and treat illnesses, injuries, and medical conditions.
skills.description_cn: 用于诊断和治疗疾病、伤害和医疗状况。

skills.name: Natural World
skills.description: Used to understand flora, fauna, and natural phenomena.
skills.description_cn: 用于理解植物、动物和自然现象。

skills.name: Navigate
skills.description: Used to determine locations, plot courses, and find directions.
skills.description_cn: 用于确定位置、规划路线和寻找方向。

skills.name: Occult
skills.description: Used to understand mystical, supernatural, or esoteric knowledge.
skills.description_cn: 用于理解神秘、超自然或深奥的知识。

skills.name: Operate Heavy Machinery
skills.description: Used to control and operate large industrial machines and equipment.
skills.description_cn: 用于控制和操作大型工业机械和设备。

skills.name: Persuade
skills.description: Used to convince others through logical arguments and reasoning.
skills.description_cn: 通过逻辑论证和推理来说服他人。

skills.name: Pilot
skills.description: Used to operate aircraft. Specializations can include specific types like Airplanes, Helicopters, etc.
skills.description_cn: 用于操作飞行器。专业化可以包括特定类型，如飞机、直升机等。

skills.name: Psychoanalysis
skills.description: Used to analyze and understand the psychological state of individuals.
skills.description_cn: 用于分析和理解个人的心理状态。

skills.name: Psychology
skills.description: Used to understand human behavior, mental processes, and emotional states.
skills.description_cn: 用于理解人类行为、心理过程和情感状态。

skills.name: Read Lips
skills.description: Used to understand speech by visually interpreting lip movements.
skills.description_cn: 通过视觉解释唇部动作来理解言语。

skills.name: Ride
skills.description: Used to control and maneuver animals or vehicles while mounted.
skills.description_cn: 用于在骑乘时控制和操纵动物或车辆。

skills.name: Science
skills.description: Represents knowledge in various scientific disciplines. Specializations can include Biology, Chemistry, etc.
skills.description_cn: 代表各种科学学科的知识。专业化可以包括生物学、化学等。

skills.name: Sleight of Hand
skills.description: Used to perform quick hand movements to manipulate objects discreetly.
skills.description_cn: 用于执行快速的手部动作以隐蔽地操纵物体。

skills.name: Spot Hidden
skills.description: Used to notice hidden objects, clues, or details in the environment.
skills.description_cn: 用于注意环境中隐藏的物体、线索或细节。

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Used to move silently and avoid detection.
skills.description_cn: 用于无声移动和避免被发现。

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: Used to sustain oneself in the wilderness, find food and shelter, and navigate natural environments.
skills.description_cn: 用于在野外维持生存，寻找食物和庇护所，以及在自然环境中导航。

skills.name: Swim
skills.description: Used to move through water efficiently and overcome aquatic challenges.
skills.description_cn: 用于高效地在水中移动并克服水上挑战。

skills.name: Throw
skills.description: Used to accurately throw objects as projectiles.
skills.description_cn: 用于准确地投掷物体作为投射物。

skills.name: Track
skills.description: Used to follow trails, identify footprints, and locate targets based on signs left behind.
skills.description_cn: 用于跟踪痕迹、识别脚印，并根据留下的迹象定位目标。
